LanguageData.CrystalineSpike.label: crystaline spike
LanguageData.CrystalineSpike.description: A large crystaline spike that replaces a forarm and hand. Manipulation is greatly decreased in exchange for a large boost to melee damage and speed
LanguageData.PowerBionicArm.label: Power Bionic Arm
LanguageData.PowerBionicArm.description: A mechanical arm that improves manipulation, melee damage and melee speed
LanguageData.PowerExoSuit.label: power exosuit
LanguageData.PowerExoSuit.description: A mechanical suit that provides the user with many enhancements
LanguageData.PowerEye.label: power bionic eye
LanguageData.PowerEye.description: A mechanical eye that improves sight
LanguageData.PowerHeart.label: power heart
LanguageData.PowerHeart.description: A mechanical heart that imporves blood pumping
LanguageData.PowerJaw.label: power jaw
LanguageData.PowerJaw.description: A mechanical jaw that provides increased eating speed and speech
LanguageData.PowerKidney.label: power kidney
LanguageData.PowerKidney.description: A mechanical kidney that improves blood filtration
LanguageData.PowerLeg.label: power bionic leg
LanguageData.PowerLeg.description: A mechanical leg that improves walking speed
LanguageData.PowerLiver.label: power liver
LanguageData.PowerLiver.description: A mechanical liver that improves blood filtration
LanguageData.PowerLung.label: power lung
LanguageData.PowerLung.description: A mechanical lung that imporves breathing
LanguageData.PowerSpine.label: power spine
LanguageData.PowerSpine.description: A mechanical spine that improves speed and manipulation
